document_name: GEF Terminal Evaluation - Capacity Building and Resource Mobilization for Sustainable Land Management in Bangladesh

outputs.output_descr:
Output1: SLM mainstreamed in related policies, institutions and legislation
Output2: Institutions strengthened and capacity developed for implementation of the National Land Use Policy
Output3: Enhanced SLM knowledge management and R & D systems in place
Output4: SLM demonstrated through pilot projects at the local level
Output5: Resources mobilized for mainstreaming SLM

project_descr: Capacity building and resource mobilization for Sustainable Land Management (Eco-system Management) in Bangladesh
